help.short: The name of the gallery application.
The name of the gallery application version.
The expand expression to apply on the operation. "ReplicationStatus" Default value is None.

schema.prop:
<prop type="array" name="targetExtendedLocations" identifiers="name">
<prop type="array" name="targetRegions" identifiers="name">
<prop type="array" name="dataDiskImages" identifiers="lun">

command.name: delete
command.confirmation: Are you sure you want to perform this operation?

help.short: The name of the gallery application.
The name of the gallery application version.

schema.name: galleryApplicationVersion
schema.prop:
<prop type="array" name="targetExtendedLocations" arg="$galleryApplicationVersion.properties.publishingProfile.targetExtendedLocations" identifiers="name">
<prop type="array" name="targetRegions" arg="$galleryApplicationVersion.properties.publishingProfile.targetRegions" identifiers="name">
<prop type="array" name="dataDiskImages" arg="@EncryptionImages_create.dataDiskImages" identifiers="lun">

<prop type="array" name="targetExtendedLocations" identifiers="name">
<prop type="array" name="targetRegions" identifiers="name">
<prop type="array" name="dataDiskImages" identifiers="lun">

command.name: update
command.argGroup:
<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="$galleryApplicationVersion.properties.publishingProfile.targetRegions" options="target-regions" group="">
<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="@EncryptionImages_update.dataDiskImages" options="data-disk-images">

schema.prop:
<prop type="array" name="targetExtendedLocations" identifiers="name">
<prop type="array" name="targetRegions" identifiers="name">
<prop type="array" name="dataDiskImages" identifiers="lun">

schema.name: galleryApplicationVersion
schema.prop:
<prop type="array" name="targetExtendedLocations" arg="$galleryApplicationVersion.properties.publishingProfile.targetExtendedLocations" identifiers="name">
<prop type="array" name="targetRegions" arg="$galleryApplicationVersion.properties.publishingProfile.targetRegions" identifiers="name">
<prop type="array" name="dataDiskImages" arg="@EncryptionImages_update.dataDiskImages" identifiers="lun">
